mapper.insert:
insert into tb_travel_spot ( SPOT_NO, SPOT_CONTENTID, SPOT_TEL, SPOT_TITLE, SPOT_IMG_PATH, SPOT_ADDRESS, SPOT_MAPX, SPOT_MAPY, LARGE_CATEGORY_NO, MIDDLE_CATEGORY_NO, SMALL_CATEGORY_NO, AREA_CATEGORY_NO, CITY_CATEGORY_NO
) values ( seq_spotno.nextval, #{spotContentId}, #{spotTel}, #{spotTitle}, #{spotImgPath}, #{spotAddress}, #{spotMapx}, #{spotMapy}, #{largeCategoryNo}, #{middleCategoryNo}, #{smallCategoryNo}, #{areaCategoryNo}, #{cityCategoryNo} )
